WriteForm.input_placeholder: Write your SMS here, it will be sent to  {{toFormatted}} from {{from}}

apk.back_home: Go back to the home page
apk.intro:
Google is quite strict about what an SMS app can do, so the app is not on the play store.

For now, you will need to install it straight from the APK file. You need to download the file, then install it. You will need to allow your web browser to install apps from "unknown sources".

Please be aware of the following limitations of the app :

  • 10 MB of storage space required
  • Google Play Services are required, as you'll need to log in with Google
  • Android 5.1 (API level 22) is the oldest android version we support.
apk.title: Install Monkey SMS on your phone

slide_0.p0: Install our android app on one or more android phones. Log in to the same google account in the app and on this page.
slide_0.p1: Read and send SMS messages from this website; Your phone can be anywhere as long as it has network access and internet.
slide_0.title: SMS from anywhere

slide_1.p0: The reason this app exists is to make the sms programmable. There are already many solutions on the market to send SMS from your computer.
slide_1.p1: However, none of them let you easily send SMS in a simple, programmable and fully automated way.
slide_1.title: Programmable

slide_2.p0: It's very difficult to get this kind of power-user app accepted on the official play store. After a few refusals of my app, I've decided to stop wasting hours on their review process. Instead, I'm distributing the apk directly, and  I've made the code fully public to give you a chance to review its behavior.
slide_2.p1: You can read the code, and if you are technically competent, you can even compile it yourself. The app is free to use for now , but please note that "open source" doesn't mean "free support" or "free hosting". I reserve the right to introduce a paid tier in the future.
slide_2.title: Open source
